channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The best credit cards for a diversified reward strategy
item.description: As a credit cards editor, I'm always looking to earn elevated rewards in my biggest spending categories. These are my go-to cards that do the trick.

item.title: American reveals first European destination for 'game-changing' new plane: Scotland
item.description: American Airlines will debut new flights from New York to Edinburgh, Scotland in 2026 with the help of its brand-new Airbus A321XLR featuring its Flag...

item.title: Double the platinum, double the perks: Why having both Amex Platinum cards is worth it
item.description: With the combination of the personal and business Platinum cards from American Express in your wallet, you can get great value and perks.

item.title: Meet Mānava Premium: Air Tahiti Nui’s new and improved premium cabin
item.description: Experience Air Tahiti Nui’s new Mānava Premium class with more comfort and Polynesian hospitality on your flight to Tahiti.

item.title: I Prefer Hotel Rewards program: How to earn and redeem points, elite status and more
item.description: Since Capital One and Citi added I Prefer Hotel Rewards as a transfer partner, here's what you need to know about earning and redeeming points, and mo...
